title: The State of Domestic Women’s Off-Road Racing: Lessons from Leadville, SBT GRVL, and Gravel Worlds
content:
What happens when there are women's-only starts vs mass starts vs extra incentives for women to ride their own race.

Read the full article at The State of Domestic Women’s Off-Road Racing: Lessons from Leadville, SBT GRVL, and Gravel Worlds on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
